name: AVA's Destiny
description:
AVA's destiny is a game made for the GMTK game jam 2020. The theme for the jam is Out of Control.

In the year 2047, a robot facility in the once-bustling city of Los Angeles has taken a dark turn.

Mechanika Inc, much sought after for its android soldiers, was to be the sole hope for the US army. However, a few failed experiments later, funds from the government slowly dried up, and Mechanika looked for help from questionable sources and the controversial CyberDyne corporation now exercised control over Mechanika’s employees and blueprints.

Tired of the mistreatment by sub-par scientists, AVA - a service robot with no rotational direction has gained sentience and secretly built a set of directional plates to overcome her flaw. With the help of a stolen gun and one objective planted firmly in mind – to take out the corrupted head of Mechanika, will a simple service bot be able to overcome an army of advanced killing robots?

Controls:

WASD: move

SPACE: shoot

ROTATE: step on plates
